alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 12:40AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Tippah, Tishomingo, Alcorn, southeastern Hardeman, McNairy, Hardin and southeastern Chester Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1240 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Sardis to near Pocahontas. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Savannah, Selmer, Iuka, Pickwick Landing State Park, J P Coleman State Park, Big Hill Pond State Park, Adamsville, Burnsville, Glen, Pickwick Dam, Theo, Pocahontas, Pineflat, Midway, Morris Chapel, Shiloh, Walnut Grove, Leedy and Olive Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
